subject_terms_3: Rail transport Pertadbiran Keretapi Tanah Melayu Photography
physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. There are four sets of railroad tracks present. Two of them on the right of the image are converged at the start, but diverge later. The railroad which is second from the right then merges with the reailroad which is second from the left side of the image. A train is occupying the railroad which is seconf from the left side of the photograph. There is a rowof windows running along its side carriages. Trees separate the four tracks from the road which is situated on the extreme left hand side of the photograph.
sgcool_label_text: "This image is part of the ""Tracking Memories"" collection by the late Mr Kwek Leng Joo. The collection captures different aspects of the Malayan Railway story in Singapore
subject_terms_1: locomotives railroads (infrastructure) trains (vehicle groupings) passenger cars (railroad cars)
